roles.title: Principal Software Engineer / Delivery Lead
roles.description: Lead a cross-functional team in the development of digital products for clients. Share expertise in the engineering, architecting, testing, and deploying of software at-scale.

roles.title: Site Reliability Engineering Manager
roles.description: Detect and address patterns of system behavior that impact platform service-level objectives. Analyze and report platform health data.

roles.title: Support Manager
roles.description: Mentored a remote team of support engineers and served as the primary technical escalation point for enterprise support.

roles.title: Senior Customer Success Engineer
roles.description: Provided technical guidance to developers working on the Pantheon platform.

roles.title: Senior Developer / Tech Lead
roles.description: Full-stack web development for national non-profits and labor unions.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Built CMS-driven content syndication tools for public radio programs.

roles.title: Multimedia Designer
roles.description: Developed digital media components for museum exhibits.
